title: i dont know what to say
body: i tried downloading lol for the third time consumed about 25 gb of my internet data and the client suddenly say error and restart the download from scratches i hate how this client which is the newest doesnt have the ability to resume the progress i dont know what to do eventually im tilted of this client .............

replies.body:
Bajeebus, 25 gigs is A LOT... in fact that's more than double than what you should be downloading for LoL! D:

Can you tell me what that error said to you? That might help me interpret what was causing this to happen. In the meantime, you may want to try some of the steps in our [**Patching Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) and attempting another patch after that!
